name: Solar system (itch) (Nesrin Hamid)
description:
Hello everyone !

This is my first project for game development class. the project was about creating a simulation for our solar system. 

In this project I was able to implement:

  • Learn where to find various versions of Unity
  • Understand the difference between Game Assets, GameObjects, and Components
  • Understand key Unity concepts such as the Project, Scene, GameObjects, Prefabs, Components, and Assets
  • Understand the 3D cartesian coordinate system, vectors, and transforms.
  • Get comfortable with navigating within and placing objects in 3D both visually and by modifying the object's transform
  • Learn the basics of creating primitives in Unity
  • Understand how to create and modify materials
  • Begin to familiarize yourself with using Unity scripts to create behaviors on Game Objects
  • Understand the basics of lighting and how to create lights
  • Understand audio sources and audio listeners
  • Understand the basics of 3D cameras and how to set them up
  • Learn how to build to multiple platforms
  • Learn how to package your builds as zip archives
  • Learn how to upload your project to a game page online (on itch.io)
  • Understand how to setup and use Prefabs
